tasks.task: Operating Agricultural Machinery and Managing Land
subtasks: Using a tractor and attached implements (e.g., flail mower, no-till planting aid) to manage cover crops, sow seed, and maintain fields.
Applying compost and fertilizer to enhance soil fertility.
Implementing reduced-tillage practices using cover crops and drilling seeds to minimize disturbance.

tasks.task: Managing Poultry for Nutrient Recycling
subtasks: Raising chickens in movable coops to fertilize fields naturally.
Monitoring and rotating chicken pens to distribute manure evenly across the farm.

tasks.task: Planting and Managing Cover Crops
subtasks: Seeding and rolling cover crops using various methods (e.g., flail mower, no-till planting aid) to suppress weeds.
Stale seedbed preparation for brassica crops.
Fine-tuning cover crop mixes and sowing techniques to optimize weed suppression and yield.

tasks.task: Diversifying Farm Operations
subtasks: Running a Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) program, including harvest sharing and member involvement.
Expanding value-added products (e.g., ferments, bulk sales) to enhance farm income.
Adapting farming systems to accommodate different market channels (e.g., local farmers' markets, retail outlets).

tasks.task: Soil and Water Management
subtasks: Monitoring and improving soil organic matter through cover cropping and reduced tillage.
Implementing mulch and raised bed techniques to manage water runoff and improve soil structure.

tasks.task: Non-Farming Duties
subtasks: Managing a grant project, participating in conferences and workshops, and promoting sustainable farming practices.
Collaborating with extension experts and researchers to evaluate new techniques.

tasks.task: Running a Divided Agriculture Operation
subtasks: Managing a Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) farm with regular buyer member interaction
Processing value-added products (e.g., ferments) for sale
Farming diverse crops and animals, including tomatoes, other vegetables, and chickens

tasks.task: Diverting Cover Crops and Fertilizers
subtasks: Planting cover crops using no-till methodology
Integrating chickens into cover crop rotations for natural fertilization
Applying compost and fertilizer as amendments

tasks.task: Implementing Reduced-Tillage Practices
subtasks: Using a flail mower to cut cover crops
Employing a spader to incorporate cover crops and chicken manure
Hand weeding when necessary

tasks.task: Managing a Ferment Kitchen
subtasks: Cleaning and maintaining a certified kitchen for ferment production
Harvesting and storing ingredients for ferments

tasks.task: Operating Farm Equipment
subtasks: Using a tractor for various tasks (driving, attaching implements)
Installing and maintaining custom equipment (e.g., no-till planting aid)

tasks.task: Boarding member interactions and distribution
subtasks: Coordinating with a core group to manage CSA harvesting and distribution
Handling extra product through online systems (e.g., Small Farm Central)

tasks.task: Collecting and Analyzing Agricultural Data
subtasks: Monitoring soil organic matter percentages
Keeping records of rainfall and soil conditions

tasks.task: Manufacturing and optimizing custom agricultural equipment (e.g., no-till planter)
Managing large-scale cover crop rotations with flail mower and no-till methods
Assembly and tending to movable chicken coops for manure distribution
Maintaining a compost system for fertilization
Operating a certified kitchen for ferment production with limited heat
Conducting agricultural research and education (e.g., attending conferences, sharing knowledge)
Facilitating CSA harvesting with member participation
Organizing online sales through platforms like Small Farm Central
Visiting and selling at the Brookside Farmers Market
Monitoring and maintaining soil organic matter with cover crops and livestock
Fine-tuning farm plans and equipment designs based on seasonal challenges
